text: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle is a 1994 biographical and drama movie. This movie is about Dorothy Parker and related writers. The movie takes place in the 1920s. Jennifer Jason Leigh plays Dorothy Parker. Also acting in this movie is Martha Plimpton: she plays Jane Grant. The movie was an Official Selection in the 1994 Cannes Film Festival. The movie was given very positive reviews from many critics. The box office performance, however, was not good. Category:1994 drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alan Rudolph
title: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle
